title: ValueError: could not convert string to float when computing shap_values for numpy.array input features type
body:
Hello,
I'm having this error when I try to generate shap_values for a LightGBM model that have categorical input features:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32578022/136035871-283cb4f5-1263-4ab8-93ff-9043449a8465.png)

Here you have a simple code to reproduce the warning:
```
df = pd.DataFrame({'A': ['Foo', 'Bar', 'Foo', 'Baz'], 'B': [1, 1, 0, 1], 'C': [1, 0, 1, 1]})
df['A'] = df['A'].astype('category')
lgb_train = lgb.Dataset(df[['A', 'B']], df['C'])

gbm = lgb.train({'objective': 'binary', 'min_data': 1, 'min_data_in_bin': 1},
                lgb_train,
                num_boost_round=1)

shap.initjs()
explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(gbm)
shap_values = explainer.shap_values(df[['A', 'B']].values)
```

my shap version: '0.39.0'
Also, it works if I provide directly the dataframe instead of the values but idk why then.
